caption.title: Sensitivity analysis showing how forecast for habitat suitability changes with changes in threshold values (5% to 25%) for five species (Aâ€“E)
caption.p: The threshold refers to the % change in the probability of habitat suitability between the future time period and the baseline time period. UH, Unsuitable Habitat; LSH, Less Suitable Habitat; PH, Persistent Habitat.
